verses.verse: So they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3322>set<s%> it in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for it: and they <S%H7126>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>sacrifices<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And when <S%H1732>David<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H4480>offering<s%> <S%H5927><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and the peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H2505>dealt<s%> to every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H376><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> both <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> to every <S%H376>one<s%> a <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and a good piece of <S%H829>flesh,<s%> and a <S%H809>flagon<s%> of wine.

And he <S%H5414>appointed<s%> certain <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and to <S%H2142>record,<s%> and to <S%H3034>thank<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

Asaph <S%H623><s%> the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> and <S%H4932>next<s%> to him <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth,<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> and <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and <S%H5654>Obed-edom:<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%> with <S%H3627>psalteries<s%> <S%H5035><s%> and with <S%H3658>harps;<s%> but <S%H623>Asaph<s%> made a <S%H8085>sound<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals;<s%>

Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> also and <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> on <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H7218>first<s%> this psalm to <S%H3034>thank<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>
Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name,<s%> make <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H5949>deeds<s%> among the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto him, sing <S%H2167>psalms<s%> unto him, <S%H7878>talk<s%> ye of <S%H3605>all<s%> his wondrous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
Glory <S%H1984><s%> ye in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name:<s%> let the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of them <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Seek <S%H1875><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and his <S%H5797>strength,<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his marvelous <S%H6381>works<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done,<s%> his <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%>
O ye <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> his chosen <S%H972>ones.<s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Be ye <S%H2142>mindful<s%> <S%H5769>always<s%> of his <S%H1285>covenant;<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations;<s%>
Even of the covenant <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and of his <S%H7621>oath<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%>
And hath <S%H5975>confirmed<s%> the same to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H2706>law,<s%> and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>
Saying, <S%H559><s%> Unto thee will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H2256>lot<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%>
When ye <S%H1961>were<s%> but <S%H4962>few,<s%> even a <S%H4592>few,<s%> and <S%H1481>strangers<s%> in it.

And when they <S%H1980>went<s%> from <S%H4480>nation<s%> <S%H1471><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and from one <S%H4480>kingdom<s%> <S%H4467><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%>
He <S%H5117>suffered<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to do them <S%H6231>wrong:<s%> yea, he <S%H3198>reproved<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> for their <S%H5921>sakes,<s%>
Saying, <S%H5060>Touch<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> mine <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> and <S%H7489>do<s%> my <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> harm.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> show <S%H1319>forth<s%> from <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
Declare <S%H5608><s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen;<s%> his marvelous <S%H6381>works<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>nations.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> also is to be <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H457>idols:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
Glory <S%H1935><s%> and <S%H1926>honor<s%> are in his <S%H6440>presence;<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2304>gladness<s%> are in his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
Give <S%H3051><s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> ye <S%H4940>kindreds<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3051>give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength.<s%>

Give <S%H3051><s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> due unto his <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H5375>bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H1927>beauty<s%> of <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>

Fear <S%H2342><s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> shall be <S%H3559>stable,<s%> that it be <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H4131>moved.<s%>

Let the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> and let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice:<s%> and let men <S%H559>say<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth.<s%>
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar,<s%> and the <S%H4393>fullness<s%> thereof: let the <S%H7704>fields<s%> <S%H5970>rejoice,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is therein.

Then <S%H227><s%> shall the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>wood<s%> sing <S%H7442>out<s%> at the <S%H4480>presence<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H935>cometh<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he is <S%H2896>good;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> ye, <S%H3467>Save<s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and gather us <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> that we may give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H7623>glory<s%> in thy <S%H8416>praise.<s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4480>forever<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and <S%H5704>ever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> and <S%H1984>praised<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So he <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> as every day's work <S%H1697>required:<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> with their <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8083>eight;<s%> <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> and <S%H2621>Hosah<s%> to be porters: <S%H7778><s%>

And <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the high <S%H1116>place<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was at <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%>

To <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and to do according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

And <S%H5973>with<s%> them <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> and the <S%H7605>rest<s%> that were <S%H1305>chosen,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by <S%H8034>name,<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever;<s%>

And <S%H5973>with<s%> them <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> for those that should make a <S%H8085>sound,<s%> and with <S%H7892>musical<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> were <S%H8179>porters.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5437>returned<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%>
